About Me

I'm Sharon Hogan studying computer science and statistics in University of Toronto. I like to work in web and app develpment but I have also recently started my lectures in machine learning. Want to know more about me? Here's my resume for reference.

My Works

I have worked with 3 small companies so far. Mountain View Technologies was my first website that I've ever made so it's simple and straightforward. Then I work for Hero Games on their website using Wordpress. The third and my current work place is First Available. I help out with everything in can get my hands on, which includes both the website and the ios application.
